main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright light in the sky from Malden, Massachusetts, on March 28, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for about one hour and was identified as the planet Venus,The object appeared as a bright white light that moved higher in the sky until it faded out at daylight,The sighting involved three witnesses,The report included a detailed questionnaire that sought extensive information from the observer,No physical evidence or photographs were documented.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: civilian observers living in an apartment
